member.name: T:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for .

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.InitializeReceiveInstagramWebHooks(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes support for receiving Instagram WebHooks. Set the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Instagram' application setting to the application secrets, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/instagram/{id}'. For details about Instagram WebHooks, see https://instagram.com/developer/realtime/.
member.param: The current config.

member.name: T:System.Web.Http.InstagramWebHookClientExtensions
member.summary: Provides various extensions for the class.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.InstagramWebHookClientExtensions.SubscribeAsync(Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient,System.String,System.Web.Http.Routing.UrlHelper)
member.summary: Subscribes to posts submitted by all users authenticated with this Instagram client.
member.param: The current instance.
A (potentially empty) ID of a particular configuration for this WebHook. This makes it possible to support multiple WebHooks with individual configurations.
A for computing the callback URI.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.InstagramWebHookClientExtensions.SubscribeAsync(Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient,System.String,System.Web.Http.Routing.UrlHelper,System.String)
member.summary: Subscribes to a particular tag. For example, For instance, a subscription for the tag 'nofilter will receive event notifications every time anyone posts a new photo with the tag '#nofilter'.
member.param: The current instance.
A (potentially empty) ID of a particular configuration for this WebHook. This makes it possible to support multiple WebHooks with individual configurations.
A for computing the callback URI.
The tag to subscribe to (without a leading '#')

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.InstagramWebHookClientExtensions.SubscribeAsync(Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient,System.String,System.Web.Http.Routing.UrlHelper,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Subscribes to a geographic area identified by a center latitude and longitude and a radius extending from the center.
member.param: The current instance.
A (potentially empty) ID of a particular configuration for this WebHook. This makes it possible to support multiple WebHooks with individual configurations.
A for computing the callback URI.
The center latitude of the geo-area to subscribe to.
The center longitude of the geo-area to subscribe to.
The radius of the geo-area in meters between 0 and 5000.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not get current Instagram subscriptions. Received status code '{0}' and error message "{1}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.InstagramReceiverResources.Client_NoHttps
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The WebHook callback must be an absolute URI and requires HTTPS in order to be secure. Please use a WebHook callback URI of type '{0}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.InstagramReceiverResources.Client_NotAbsoluteCallback
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The URI for where Instagram will send WebHook requests must be an absolute URI. By default this should be of the form '{0}'..

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramNotificationCollection

member.summary: Describes an Instagram WebHook event notification. For details about Instagram WebHooks, please see https://instagram.com/developer/realtime/.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramNotification.Object
member.summary: Gets or sets the object type for this subscription. The basic types provided by Instagram are 'user', 'tag', 'location', and 'geography'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramNotification.ObjectId
member.summary: Gets or sets an additional parameter for this subscription depending on whether it is a user, tag, location, or geography-based subscription.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramNotification.SubscriptionId
member.summary: Gets or sets the subscription ID.

member.summary: Gets or sets the subscription ID.

member.summary: Gets or sets the object type for this subscription. The basic types provided by Instagram are 'user', 'tag', 'location', and 'geography'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramSubscription.ObjectId
member.summary: Gets or sets an additional parameter for this subscription depending on whether it is a user, tag, location, or geography-based subscription. For instance, if you create a subscription for the tag 'nofilter', you will will receive an event notification every time anyone posts a new photo with the tag '#nofilter'.

member.summary: Gets or sets the callback URI where event notifications are sent.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient
member.summary: The provides support for managing Instagram WebHook subscriptions programmatically. For more information about Instagram WebHooks, please see https://instagram.com/developer/realtime/.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient.#ctor(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the which can be used to create and delete WebHooks with Instagram. For more information about Instagram WebHooks, please see https://instagram.com/developer/realtime/. Set the application settings 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Instagram' and 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_InstagramId' to the Instagram client ID and secret respectively, optionally using the 'id' syntax to accommodate multiple configurations using the same model as for receivers.
member.param: The current .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient.#ctor(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration,System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the with the given . This constructor is intended for unit testing purposes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient.GetAllSubscriptionsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the current set of subscriptions for the given client.
member.param: A (potentially empty) ID of a particular configuration for this WebHook. This makes it possible to support multiple WebHooks with individual configurations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient.SubscribeAsync(System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: Subscribes to posts submitted by all users authenticated with this Instagram client.
member.param: A (potentially empty) ID of a particular configuration for this WebHook. This makes it possible to support multiple WebHooks with individual configurations.
The URI where WebHooks for the given subscription will be received. Typically this will be of the form https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/instagram/{id}.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient.SubscribeAsync(System.String,System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Subscribes to a particular tag. For example, For instance, a subscription for the tag 'nofilter will receive event notifications every time anyone posts a new photo with the tag '#nofilter'.
member.param: A (potentially empty) ID of a particular configuration for this WebHook. This makes it possible to support multiple WebHooks with individual configurations.
The URI where WebHooks for the given subscription will be received. Typically this will be of the form https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/instagram/{id}.
The tag to subscribe to (without a leading '#')

The radius of the geo-area in meters between 0 and 5000.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient.GetRecentGeoMedia(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets information about recent media posted to a subscription to a geographic area identified by a center latitude and longitude and a radius extending from the center.
member.param: A (potentially empty) ID of a particular configuration for this WebHook.
The geo ID is the from a geographic subscription, for example '12980749'.
member.returns: A containing information about available media posted within the geographic area of the subscription.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookClient.GetClientConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Client ID and Client Secret for the Instagram Client application.
member.param: A (potentially empty) ID of a particular configuration for this WebHook.
member.returns: A containing the Client ID and Client Secret.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookReceiver
member.summary: Provides an implementation which supports WebHooks generated by Instagram. Set the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Instagram' application setting to the application secrets, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/instagram/{id}'. For details about Instagram WebHooks, see https://instagram.com/developer/realtime/.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.InstagramWebHookReceiver.VerifySignature(System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Verifies that the signature header matches that of the actual body.

member.summary: Creates a response to a WebHook verification GET request.

member.summary: Gets the notification actions form the given .
